name: Welcome Series Workflow

prerequisites.notes: Ensure templates exist before running this workflow

steps.title: Create Drip Campaign
steps.prompt:
Create a welcome drip campaign named 'New Subscriber Welcome Series' triggered on contact.created with 3 emails:
1. Welcome email immediately using template welcome_1 with subject 'Welcome to Our Community!'
2. Product tour after 2 days using template tour_1 with subject 'Get Started in 5 Minutes'
3. Special offer after 5 days using template offer_1 with subject 'Special Offer Just for You'
steps.notes: Campaign is created as DRAFT by default

steps.title: Review Drip Campaign
steps.prompt: Show me details of the drip campaign we just created
steps.notes: Verify all emails are configured correctly before activating

steps.title: Activate Drip Campaign
steps.prompt: Activate the welcome series drip campaign
steps.notes: This will require confirmation: 'yes, activate it'

steps.title: Confirm Activation
steps.notes: New subscribers will automatically receive the email sequence

steps.title: Monitor Performance (After 7+ Days)
steps.prompt: How is the welcome series drip campaign performing?

expected_output.performance_metrics: Open rates, click rates per email

steps.notes: Check performance after campaign has been running for at least 7 days

common_issues.solution: Create templates first using 'list my templates' to verify they exist
Ensure all template IDs are valid and campaign is in draft status

next_steps: Monitor open rates for each email
A/B test subject lines if open rates are below 40%
Adjust timing between emails based on engagement
Create follow-up sequence for engaged subscribers
